verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — A former campaign manager for Donald Trump [V: is] doubling down on his dismissive comment regarding a girl with Down syndrome .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — A former campaign manager for Donald Trump is doubling down on [ARG0: his dismissive comment] [V: regarding] [ARG1: a girl with Down syndrome] .
